summary.span: 为 XHTML 适配器集（包括可扩展超文本标记语言 (XHTML)、XHTML Mobile 和无线标记语言 (WML)）的目标设备提供文本编写器功能。

span.span: Provides text writer functionality for devices targeted by the XHTML adapter set, including Extensible Hypertext Markup Language (XHTML), XHTML Mobile, and Wireless Markup Language (WML).

summary.span: 若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET (ASP.NET 移动应用和网站)。

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET.

remarks.format: ## Remarks XHTML 是一个基于 XML 4.1 的兼容标记，可用于创建适用于多个设备类型的网站。XHTML is an XML-compliant markup that is based on HTML 4.1 and allows you to create Web sites suitable for multiple device types. 它将 HTML 的易用性与 XML 的严格元素准则结合起来，以生成具有各种格式和样式选项的标记语言，并减少标记不明确的标记。It merges HTML's ease of use with XML's strict element guidelines to produce a markup language with a wide range of format and style options and reduced markup tag ambiguity. 此类提供 ASP.NET 服务器控件在向客户端呈现 XHTML 内容时使用的格式化功能。This class provides formatting capabilities that ASP.NET server controls use when rendering XHTML content to clients. 呈现满足三个不同 XHTML 文档类型标准的标记： XHTML Basic，支持有限的样式和格式元素;XHTML 移动配置文件，它支持内联样式表;和 WML 2.0，基于 XHTML 1.1 并支持级联样式表。The renders markup that meets the standards of three different XHTML doc types: XHTML Basic, which supports limited style and format elements; XHTML Mobile Profile, which supports inline style sheets; and WML 2.0, which is based on XHTML 1.1 and supports cascading style sheets. 此类主要由自定义移动页和控件适配器的开发人员使用。This class is used primarily by developers of custom mobile page and control adapters. 类可以呈现所有 HTML 元素、特性和样式属性，但与 类不同，不允许这些标记元素的标题大写。The class can render all HTML elements, attributes, and style attributes, but, unlike the class, does not allow title capitalization of these markup elements. 实例化一个 ，根据目标设备的功能，初始化多个属性，如 、和 ，它们有助于文本编写器呈现该页及其控件。An instantiates an and depending on the capabilities of the target device, initializes a number of properties, such as , , and , that assist the text writer in rendering the page and its controls. 适配器可以使用各种方法来应用样式和控制格式：Your adapter can use a variety of methods to apply styles and control formatting: - 和 ， and , - 和 以及 and , and - 和 。 and . > [!NOTE] > 此类派生自 类，该类反过来派生自 类，并且它的许多功能都由这些基类提供。This class derives from the class, which in turn derives from the class, and much of its functionality is provided by these base classes. 你可以使用此类的成员及其从 类继承的任何成员来创建自定义的文本编写器，以在自定义 XHTML 页或类适配器中使用。You can use the members of this class, and any members it inherits from the class, to create custom text writers to use in a custom XHTML page or in class adapters. 你还可以创建新的派生类，用于重写 类的标准行为。You can also create new derived classes that override the standard behavior of the class. 需要设备筛选才能使用特定的适配器或服务器控件的文本编写器。Device filtering is required in order to use a specific adapter or text writer for a server control. 有关设备筛选的详细信息，请参阅自适应控制行为和[设备筛选概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ms178620(v=vs.100))[的体系结构概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/67276kc5(v=vs.100))。For more information about device filtering, see [Architectural Overview of Adaptive Control Behavior](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/67276kc5(v=vs.100)) and [Device Filtering Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ms178620(v=vs.100)).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 文本编写器由特定目标设备的相应页适配器实例化，并由页适配器和页上每个控件的适配器使用。Text writers are instantiated by a corresponding page adapter for a specific target device, and then used by the page adapter and the adapters for each control on the page. 此类主要由自定义移动页和控件适配器的开发人员使用。This class is used primarily by developers of custom mobile page and control adapters.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 某些设备不允许在元素中使用内联样式，但需要从链接样式表提供样式信息。Some devices do not allow inline styles in elements, but require style information to be provided from a linked style sheet. 如果链接样式表存储在 中，则 URL 包含唯一的 ，用于标识要返回的样式表。If the linked style sheet is stored in the , the URL contains a unique that identifies the style sheet to return. 对于这些目标设备， 会将呈现的控件中的样式信息移动到用于缓存的样式表中。For these target devices, the moves style information from rendered controls to a style sheet for caching. 页面适配器可以指示 使用 在 中保存样式表，或在呈现页面之前使用 将样式表保存在 中。A page adapter can instruct the to save the style sheet in the using , or in the using before rendering the page. 此属性主要由自定义移动页和控件适配器的开发人员使用。This property is used primarily by developers of custom mobile page and control adapters.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 某些设备不允许在元素中使用内联样式，但需要从链接样式表提供样式信息。Some devices do not allow inline styles in elements, but require style information to be provided from a linked style sheet. 如果链接样式表存储在 中，则 URL 包含唯一的 ，用于标识要返回的样式表。If the linked style sheet is stored in the , the URL contains a unique that identifies the style sheet to return. 对于这些目标设备， 会将呈现的控件中的样式信息移动到样式表中，以便在 中进行缓存。For these target devices, the moves style information from rendered controls to a style sheet for caching in the . 页面适配器可以指示 使用 在 中保存样式表，或在呈现页面之前使用 将样式表保存在 中。A page adapter can instruct the to save the style sheet in the using , or in the using before rendering the page. 此属性主要由自定义移动页和控件适配器的开发人员使用。This property is used primarily by developers of custom mobile page and control adapters.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 参数的名称和 URL 值都进行了编码，并在它们之间插入一个等号（=）。Both the name of the parameter and the URL value are encoded, and an equal sign (=) is inserted between them. `name` 或 `value` 字符串中的空格编码为加号（+），等号（=）编码为% 3d。Spaces in the `name` or `value` strings are encoded as plus signs (+), and equal signs (=) are encoded as %3d.
